enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: Report of the GEF to the COP
sentences: This issue was addressed by SBI on Tuesday, 2 December, and in informal consultations conducted by SBI Chair Stoycheva.
On Tuesday, 2 December, the GEF highlighted its initiatives on climate change.
Tanzania, for the LDCs, stressed the need for expedited procedures for the approval of NAPAs.
China and Brazil urged accelerated funding for second national communications, and Algeria expressed concern about lack of progress and funding.
On Wednesday, 10 December, SBI agreed to forward the decision to the COP, which adopted it on Friday, 12 December.
The COP also took note of the Report of the GEF (FCCC/CP/2003/3).
